## Another CodeFocus Example

Progressive code reveal:

```{.r code-line-numbers="1-2|4-7|9-12"}
# Load libraries
library(tidyverse)

# Read and clean data
data <- read_csv("data.csv") %>%
  filter(!is.na(value)) %>%
  mutate(category = as.factor(category))

# Create visualization
ggplot(data, aes(x = category, y = value)) +
  geom_boxplot(fill = "steelblue") +
  theme_minimal()
```


# Combined Features {data-stack-name="Combined"}

## Full Example

This code block has both fullscreen and line highlighting:

```{.javascript code-line-numbers="1-3|5-10|12-16"}
// Configuration
const config = {
  apiKey: process.env.API_KEY,
};

// Async data fetching
async function fetchData(endpoint) {
  const response = await fetch(endpoint);
  const data = await response.json();
  return data;
}

// Main execution
fetchData("/api/users")
  .then((users) => console.log(users))
  .catch((err) => console.error(err));
```
